create a new quarto blog post

Source: R/quarto_create_post.R
ft_quarto_create_post.Rd

Sets up the directory for a new blog post. Note this function was modified from the one originally supplied by Tom Mock.

Usage

ft_quarto_create_post(
  title,
  file = "index.qmd",
  subtitle = "",
  date = Sys.Date(),
  draft = FALSE,
  title_limit = 40,
  open_file = TRUE
)

Arguments

title

the title of the post

file

what file should be output (default is index.qmd)

subtitle

what the subtitle should be

date

the date of the post

draft

is this a draft post?

title_limit

maximum number of characters in the title

open_file

should the file be opened by RStudio?

See also

Other Quarto: ft_quarto_get_categories()
